title: Finding Keepers
description: The Royal Family has been sensing danger coming to the Realm for five years. Valerie Rose Gardner has had a vision of strange brown starships attacking one of the Realm’s planets and killing everyone. She has also seen a new Super Psychic that could save the Realm from the invaders. She doesn’t know where he is and the Searchers are working overtime to find him.She knows that he must be found, and quickly, before the Realm is finding Keepers at every member’s planet. Their ships are indestructible and their beams destroy everything they touch. Even more important than finding this possible savior of the Realm is finding the Gardners.
author: Saxon Andrew
